title: Online Game: The King of the New World - Novel Updates
tags: Futuristic Setting   Gamers   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong
author: Juan Niao Xian Shui   倦鸟先睡
description: A global cooling period is approaching. In order to reduce resource consumption, countries worldwide have jointly developed an ecological game called the New World where one can exchange currencies with reality and make money from it. After being rejected by countless companies in a row, Xu Yu gives up looking for a job. After all, he's not good at anything except playing games. Perhaps, the New World is where he belongs. Soon he will find out more about himself than he ever knew.>
